metadata.title: CVE-2019-19079 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A memory leak in the qrtr_tun_write_iter() function in net/qrtr/tun.c inthe Linux kernel before 5.3 allows attackers to cause a denial of service(memory consumption), aka CID-a21b7f0cff19.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
